title: Ontology-Based E-Learning Assessment System Design and Application to Language Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic ontology concepts and practical experience in language education
context.additional_context: Focuses on developing assessment tools immediately applicable to language education settings for working professionals.

learning_goals: Learners can design language proficiency assessment indicators utilizing ontology structures
Learners can generate personalized knowledge graphs based on learner data collected in e-learning environments
Learners can propose assessment systems applicable to real language education settings through project deliverables
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
